metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11049 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
In FreeRDP after 1.1 and before 2.0.0, there is an out-of-bound read ofclient memory that is then passed on to the protocol parser. This has beenpatched in 2.0.0.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11049` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp-x11 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-cache1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4
libfreerdp-client1.1 - 1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4

criterions.comment: freerdp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.1.0~git20140921.1.440916e+dfsg1-5ubuntu1.4').
